name: Gravel
description: Gravel is the ultimate off-road experience. The most extreme racing game that will let you try out amazing stunts in the wildest places on the planet!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or later Processor: Intel Core i5-2500,  AMD FX-8100 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 with 2 GB VRAM or more / AMD Radeon HD 7950 with 2 GB VRAM or more DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or later Processor: Intel Core i7-2600,  AMD FX-8350 or equivalent Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4 GB VRAM or more | AMD Radeon R9 380 with 4 GB VRAM or more DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
